alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:41PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Moore, southeastern Davidson, northern Montgomery, southwestern Randolph and northeastern Stanly Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Badin Lake. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Asheboro, Albemarle, Badin Lake, Seagrove, Badin, Steeds, Eldorado, Fish Tales Marina, Morrow Mountain State Park and Whip-O-Will Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
